resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

kou commented on pull request #12513:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12513#issuecomment-1055890838


   GitHub says "closed" but your change was merged into master.
   This is caused because we use our merge tool instead of GitHub's merge button.
   
   See also: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12004#issuecomment-1031955625
   
   It may be better that we document about this somewhere... Do you want to work on the documentation task?
   


-- 
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.

To unsubscribe, e-mail: github-unsubscribe@arrow.apache.org

users@infra.apache.org

kou commented on pull request #12513:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12513#issuecomment-1055892755


   Or we may be able to use GitHub's merge API instead of `git push`. Then GitHub will say "merged" not "closed".


--

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: In Findre2Alt.cmake, cmake module find re2 package config first, which is likely to find system re2 package first over my customized re2 library. We should check RE2_ROOT variable first, and if there is no value existed, then we should search for system re2.
